step_feedback.feedback: You are doing a good job of sitting or standing comfortably. Keep focusing on maintaining this posture.
Your hand placement on your abdomen is good. Continue to focus on this placement.
You are inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles well. Try to visualize the fluid moving to your chest more clearly.
You are exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles effectively. Keep up the good work visualizing pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: Great job with your deep breathing! You're effectively placing your hands and inhaling/exhaling. Focus a bit more on visualizing the fluid movement during your breaths to maximize the lymphatic benefits.
